original_text: And if the whole congregation of Israel sin through ignorance, and the thing be hid from the eyes of the assembly, and they have done somewhat against any of the commandments of the Lord concerning things which should not be done, and are guilty;
korean_text: 만일 이스라엘 온 회중이 여호와의 계명 중 하나라도 부지중에 범하여 허물이 있으나 스스로 깨닫지 못하다가

sentences.original_text: And if the whole congregation of Israel sin through ignorance
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만약 이스라엘 온 회중이 무지로 죄를 범하면

sentences.original_text: and the thing be hid from the eyes of the assembly
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 일이 회중의 눈에 숨겨지고

sentences.original_text: and they have done somewhat against any of the commandments of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 주의 계명 중 어떤 것을 어기고

sentences.original_text: concerning things which should not be done
